results.title: Huangkui capsule in combination with metformin ameliorates diabetic nephropathy via the Klotho/TGF-beta1/p38MAPK signaling pathway.
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were randomly divided into five groups: normal control, @DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@DN@@@, HKC (1.0 g/kg/day), @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ (100 mg/kg/d), and HKC plus @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ (1.0 g/kg/day + 100 mg/kg/d).

citations.NLM: Gu LY, Yun-Sun, Tang HT, Xu ZX. Huangkui capsule in combination with metformin ameliorates diabetic nephropathy via the Klotho/TGF-beta1/p38MAPK signaling pathway. J Ethnopharmacol. 2021 Dec 5;281():113548. PMID: 33152427
